sentences.en: All things are in a state of flux.
Both quantum mechanics and chaos theory suggest a world constantly in flux.
sentences.cn: 量子力学和混沌理论都表明世界永远处于不断变化中。

sentences.en: Education remains in a state of flux which will take some time to settle down.
sentences.cn: 教育处于不断的变化中，需要一段时间才能稳定下来。

sentences.en: Emittance and irradiance are meaningful measurements of flux at a specific surface.
sentences.cn: 发射强度和辐照强度只有对一定表面上通量的量度才是有意义的.

sentences.en: Events are in a state of flux.
Everything is in flux at the moment.
He perfected a flux - gate sensor in 1941.
sentences.cn: 他在1941年制成了一台磁通脉冲传感器.

sentences.en: Here was the whole world in storm and flux.
sentences.cn: 全世界正处于风雨飘摇中.

sentences.en: I have tried to apprehend the Pythagorean power by which number holds sway above the flux.
sentences.cn: 我力图领悟毕达哥拉斯的才能,他的才能使数字支配着不断变动的事物.

sentences.en: In most reactors, there is a significant flux of fast neutrons.
sentences.cn: 在大部分反应堆中都有一定强度的快中子流.

sentences.en: In steady flow, mass flux is constant.
sentences.cn: 在稳定流动中, 质量通量是恒定不变的.

sentences.en: Rayleigh scatter determines the upwelling diffuse flux which can be absorbed.
sentences.cn: Rayleigh散射决定了能被吸收的向外的漫射通量.

sentences.en: So without having to repeat all those parameters just assume that when I write down flux it represents these variables.
sentences.cn: 所以，不需要重复，所有那些几何,假设当我们写下流量时,它表现了这些变量。

sentences.en: The education system is still in a state of flux .
sentences.cn: 教育体制仍处于不断变化之中。

sentences.en: The flux is generally an organic salt dissolved in water and alcohol mixture.
sentences.cn: 助熔剂通常是一种溶于水和酒精中的有机盐混合物.

sentences.en: The magnetization process consists of many small discontinuous flux changes.
sentences.cn: 磁化过程包括许多小而不连续的磁通变化.

sentences.en: The market is in a constant state of flux.
The radio flux is extremely variable, exhibiting erratic outbursts.
sentences.cn: 射电流量变化极大, 显示出无规则爆发.

sentences.en: When the secondary circuit is open, the core flux is produced by the primary current only.
sentences.cn: 当次级电路开路时, 铁芯磁通量仅仅由初级电流产生.

phrases.tran_cn: 药芯焊丝；含熔剂芯焊条
通量密度；辐射流密度；流量密度
热流密度；热淋度；热通密度
n. 光通量（单位为流明lumen）
n. 水通量；水溶性焊剂

trans.tran_cn: 不断的变动，流动，波动，流体
trans.tran_en: a situation in which things are changing a lot and you cannot be sure what will happen
